<noinclude>{{month|August}}
Events that occurred on 8 August
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1904]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a [[Letter to Father Francis Morgan|letter to Francis Morgan]].
* '''[[1924]]''' - Director [[Gene Deitch]] is born.
* '''[[1925]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith (8 August 1925)|a letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith]].
* '''[[1953]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 139]].
* '''[[1981]]''' - [[Mythcon 12]] at [[wikipedia:Mills College|Mills College]] in [[wikipedia:Oakland, California|Oakland]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[1986]]''' - [[Mythcon 17]] at [[wikipedia:California State University|California State University]] in [[wikipedia:Long Beach, California|Long Beach]].
* '''[[1994]]''' - [[Mythcon 25]] at [[wikipedia:American University|American University]], [[wikipedia:Washington, D.C.|Washington, D.C.]]
* '''[[1995]]''' - ''[[Tyalië Tyelelliéva]]'' issue [[Tyalië Tyelelliéva 6|6]] is published.
* '''[[1995]]''' - ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'' issue [[Parma Eldalamberon 11|11]] is published.
* '''[[1997]]''' - [[Mythcon 28]] at [[wikipedia:Pepperdine University|Pepperdine University]] in [[wikipedia:Malibu, California|Malibu]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[2002]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing IV]] in [[wikipedia:Westerwald|Westerwald]], [[wikipedia:Germany|Germany]].
* '''[[2005]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Minya] - 1st International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[wikipedia:Stockholm|Stockholm]], [[wikipedia:Sweden|Sweden]].
* '''[[2007]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Tatya] - the 2nd International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[wikipedia:Antwerp|Antwerp]], [[wikipedia:Belgium|Belgium]].
* '''[[2009]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Nelya] - 3rd International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[wikipedia:Whitehaven|Whitehaven]], [[wikipedia:England|England]].
* '''[[2013]]''' - [[Omentielva|Omentielva Lempea]] - 5th International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in Helsinki, Finland.
* '''[[2014]]''' - [[Mythcon 45]] in [[wikipedia:Wheaton College (Massachusetts)|Wheaton College]], [[wikipedia:Massachusetts|Massachusetts]].
* '''[[2015]]''' - [[Omentielva|Omentielva Enquea]] - Sixth International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[Greisinger Museum]], Switzerland.
